title: The Big Secret for the Small Investor: The Shortest Route to Long-Term Investment Success
description: In The Big Secret for the Small Investor, bestselling author Joel Greenblatt explains to everyday investors how to value a business, and why the small investor has an inherent edge over the big investment firms that have to show results month by month, quarter by quarter, year by year. Greenblatt then goes on to point out four to five options for small investors on how to take advantage of that edge.
author: Joel Greenblatt
